subject: Stadiums and Arenas
Atlantic Yards (Brooklyn)
lead_paragraph: The Nets, who had hoped to move into a new arena near downtown Brooklyn in time for the 2009-10 season, now acknowledge that construction will not be finished until sometime in 2010.
snippet: The Nets, who had hoped to move into a new arena near downtown Brooklyn in time for the 2009-10 season, now acknowledge that construction will not be finished until sometime in 2010.
